mapper.select: select * from vpn.user where name=#{name} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update vpn.user set score=score+#{score} where name=#{name}

update vpn.user
level = #{level},
score = #{score},
paidStartTime = #{paidStartTime},
paidEndTime = #{paidEndTime},
where name=#{name}
update vpn.user set level=0 where paidEndTime <= #{end}
update vpn.user set email=#{email} where name=#{name}
update vpn.user set level=1,score=score-2500,paidEndTime=#{time} where score >= 2500 and paidEndTime <= #{end}
update vpn.user set level=2,score=score-4500,paidEndTime=#{time} where score >= 4500 and paidEndTime <= #{end}
